chunks.chunk_text: 哈囉大家好我是Lydia歡迎大家收聽電商讀書會跟通勤寫音Read第三次合作的節目那我們今天事實上想要來跟大家聊聊一個之前還蠻紅的社交媒體叫做Threat那在我們開始聊之前我相信電商讀書會的朋友都已經很熟悉我們的節目會跟大家分享一些數碼的知識電商或者是市場的新資訊那我不知道是不是方便
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: BENJAMIN BUTTON 給我
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 在我生命中是一個很大的轉折點所以我記得了這些事情然後後來我重新移居然後社交媒體消失了世界變化了 完全變化了對我而言所有事情都變化了經濟環境變化得很快然後現在我們看到Meta是地球上最大的公司
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以時間飛過了當你真的在玩的時候另一個原因為何Threads沒有發行之後的流行性是因為另外一個原因為何人們沒有在Threads下載之後的流行性是因為其實當人們在Instagram上專注於影片的時候
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 視覺影響者通常都不是最好的100%所以視覺上最好的人可能不夠強烈地創作有興趣的內容同意所以如果你讓人們或影響者的成員開始使用Threads然後他們可以把一些他們的追蹤者帶到Threads但因為他們真的不知道如何使用Threads來展示自己
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 所以如果你想要追蹤一個很漂亮的人為何他們只能使用幾個字來展示他們是多麼漂亮的所以我認為為何Threads可能不夠強烈地讓視覺影響者使用Threads而且因為當你拍一張照片然後在Instagram上發佈就很容易了
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你不用擔心你的照片是漂亮還是不漂亮因為如果你只在故事上發佈的話那些訊息就會消失在24小時後但這並不是Threads你必須考慮如何讓人們願意與你合作這跟Instagram完全是不同的方式
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 在這個角度上,視覺影響者的影響力是更強烈的但可能他們認為視覺影響者的粉絲他們也會喜歡看一些個人的故事在寫作或是他們看不到的東西在Instagram上發佈的視覺影響力這就是他們認為Threads能夠為Instagram提升但是如你所說
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 視覺影響者的粉絲是否真的想要看?我們真的想看其他人的照片?我們真的想看他們對其他人的說話?他們的小訊息給粉絲或是給家人的訊息?我們是否想看這些?我不太確定如果在這個範疇上是否很值得的像你所說的幾個因素他們都非常合理因為我們回顧
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 現在的社交媒體我猜Meta在那個時候相信他們有足夠的用戶在Facebook、Instagram以及整個Meta的社交媒體環境去持有這個新的社交媒體平台去探索新的機會但作為一家公司一人會這樣想因為你認為你有力量、你有市場、你有收入但這個世界非常苦惱用戶非常苦惱
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 如果他們不喜歡的話,他們會告訴你他們只會簽署,他們會辭退他們不會用戶
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你也可以寫500個戶口你可以寫更長的戶口
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這不是一個提供給我更多的戶口這是最大的問題這是什麼提供給我寫長的戶口?沒有提供
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 因為他們想把這個提供作為社交媒體例如說我擁有一個小的藍色戶口而你卻不擁有然後它變成了提供新的用戶給Twitter的藍色用戶之類的並沒有成功因為用戶不在乎用戶已經建立了他們的空間現在是他們的空間他們不願意改變因為你提供了新的用戶他們不願意嘗試,就這樣
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你想想,Lydia,你去買的超市如果今天有人強迫你去買在不同的超市你會覺得很奇怪,會覺得很奇怪,對嗎?直到那個超市我可能會嘗試一次如果當地人強迫我去買在新的超市我可能會嘗試但如果那個超市不驚訝我,價格、介紹、品質
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 全都很相似全都會把我買在新的超市旁邊那為什麼我會去買在新的超市?人們不容易改變習慣當你形成了習慣,人們不改變,用戶不改變好,這就是個人的問題而下一個問題是,Threads說我們沒有廣告Twitter有廣告,我們沒有廣告我不知道
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 今天如果沒有廣告的社交媒體平台是一個提供給人們留下來我不太確定,但我們都知道發生了什麼我們都知道,人們不在乎,用戶不在乎你給他們一個好選項,你給他們一個網絡,你給他們一個社群他們對廣告沒問題,這是他們想要的我覺得人們很習慣看廣告
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你剛才提到一個很好的點子,今年我開始注意到我的LINE應用程式有這些Banner的廣告超級煩躁超級煩躁我發現這些廣告但你仍然在使用它,對嗎?因為你需要跟朋友和家人溝通對,這不讓我離開使用LINE,告訴我的朋友和家人
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hey, there are ads now, so let's better leave LINE, no?Yeah, and I think after you see the banner, more often, maybe after, you know, like three, four months later, then you will feel, okay, it's there, always there.Selectively, you won't see it, right? Like you have this filter on your eyes that says, hey, don't see the banner ads.I know, I know, it just goes away, sort of just goes away once you get used to it.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: So every little new feature that you add or you change for your users, it takes a while for your users to get used to it.And unfortunately, just was not very new.It didn't feel very new at all, right?And then it says, okay, we are direct competitor of Twitter and everything is the same or almost the same.So what's the point?Yeah, so it lost its novelty, I think.Definitely in the first few weeks, there was some novelty to it because some celebrities
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: went on threads and then you wanted to follow the celebrities and then there was some social status.And that quickly lost a lot of steam in the first week or so.And I think that week I was working, I was kind of busy that week.So I sort of stayed abreast of the headlines.But by the time I really had time to sit down and read the articles and understand what's going on, it lost steam already.It had this major drop off and I said, thank you very much.I don't need to worry about this anymore.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: God bless you guys.I'm going back to my normal life.So that was July for me, I have to say.But I think one thing that I noticed throughout this year, one thing, Lydia, I think this is also a quiz for you.Why the name threads?This is something most of my students in July, August and September, when I sat down with
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: all my clients and I sat down with them and I asked them.So they all asked me, do you use threads?And I said, well, I'm too old for this.And then when they talk about it, my question to them was, do you know why it's named threads?Why does it tie in?Can you explain?Yeah, why does it tie in?Why does this English word tie in with this social media platform?Why wasn't it W or Z or just a meta baby?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: Baby meta, something like that.Why not something cool or hip?Why the word thread or threads?Okay, so here is the real reason why.Because in a lot of forums and in Twitter and in any online whatever platform, when you create a new topic in the forum, it's called a discussion thread, discussion thread.So you create a topic.Okay.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: So similar to our mobile one and PTT, you create a post and you ask a question.So that becomes a discussion thread.Everything down below this thread is responding to the question of this particular post or the content of this particular post.So this is like a mini folder of posts, like a hashtag of posts that bundles them together.So therefore,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: if this platform provides a lot of discussion threads, then calling it the word threads will make 100% sense.Okay, that sounds really reasonable.Yeah, it makes sense.So it actually, in terms of branding, I think it worked.I think it was a great branding threads.Much easier than Twitter, because what's Twitter?Tweet what?Little bird, blue bird, white bird.You know, in 2009, 2010, when social media just started,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: it was kind of cool to try something new.Today, nobody's willing to try something new.People want to receive information or people want to see it or people want to experience it very quickly.We are very, very efficient now.We've seen all the bells and whistles online.We've seen everything.We've seen VR, metaverse, the whole works.So stop playing games.Just give us exactly what we want to know.What kind of platform is this?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: That's really interesting.And I bet many people don't know.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: They are not yet to think about this question.Yes, they didn't get time to say, okay, so what does this name mean?So now you guys know, for the fans of Dian Zhang Du Zhu Wei and also our 15 means family.Now you guys know.So you go to mobile one, you go to PTT, you go to any of these forums or bulletin boards or social media platforms.When you create the main topic, when you create a post,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: that generates a lot of responses, that is a thread.So the platform threads.At that time in July, I thought, well named.That was a good name.That was a good name.Very easy to understand.If you're somebody who knows internet and social media platforms, great name.Fantastic.It just didn't take off.I'm sorry, Mark.It didn't go the way you wanted to.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: We are finally able to launch in EU at December this year.But I mean people are already not interested anymore.So if you want to let people start using it, you need to think about something else to let them to engage with you.I say if you can have Mark and Elon discussing things, creating many threads, discussion topics and threads,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins英語咖啡館 Ep.198 _ 今年串不起來的毛線 The rise and fall of Threads.json

chunks.chunk_text: then yeah, it'll take off.No, that's not possible.I'm sorry.That's not the way things work.Yes.Elon is too busy now with other things.It's a very fast moving gear, I feel.And I think I'm kind of getting too old for this.You know, it's like the train is driving at 300 kilometers per hour.It's driving a little fast for me now.So Lydia, before we sign off today, what is your

chunks.chunk_text: right now.And it doesn't hurt to give it a try.And at the same time, we can stay put and observe and see where Mark and Elon and also Sam Altman will take us in the next coming year.It's very, very exciting year already, 2023.I can't wait to see what the interesting things they will bring to the table in 2024.Right.This year has been really, really eventful.And December is the time to reflect and review on what we've done

chunks.chunk_text: in the year.So exactly like Lydia says, I think most of us would also take this opportunity and do a little bit of reflection and reviewing with our friends and family.This is the season of love and laughter and also the time where we will get to experience fireworks.So I hope you guys will enjoy the fireworks and all your parties.All right.I'm too old to go to 101 and all the fun places to see all the fireworks.

chunks.chunk_text: But I hope you guys have tons of fun.And that's all the time we have for you, for fans and friends of Dian Shang Du Shu Hui and all our 15 Minutes family.So until next time, we will probably see you by the time of our next recording with Lydia and Caria.It will probably be 2024.So we will see you next year.Same time, same place on 15 Minutes Cafe.See you guys.Bye-bye.
